body.p:
When it exposed the draft amendments for comment, the Board also proposed to clarify the definition of accounting policies by removing the terms ‘conventions’ and ‘rules’, and referring to ‘measurement bases’ instead of ‘bases’. The Board expected that those changes would not change the scope of the definition. However, feedback suggested those proposed changes:
(a)
might not improve the definition, because the remaining terms in the definition would remain undefined and could be open to diverse interpretations; and
(b)
might unintentionally narrow the scope of the definition.
